mapper.select: SELECT tcui.company_checked, tcui.street_checked, tcui.center_checked, tcui.have_submit, tcui.item_name, tcui.company_user_item_id, tu.real_name, tcui.submit_time FROM talent_company_user_item tcui LEFT JOIN talent_user tu ON tcui.user_id=tu.user_id WHERE tcui.center_checked = #{centerChecked,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND tcui.parent_id = 0 AND tcui.have_submit = 1 AND tcui.street_checked = 4
